name: Tales of Thisrea
description:
An interactive novel set in a fantasy realm called Thisrea. In this this game you will make choices that affect how the story turns out. Discover what mystical experiments your mage friend Thilin is working on.

From Mind Forge Studios. Written by Andrew Pullins

Features

  • Read the story and chose what the main character does.
  • Outcomes are determined by decisions you make.
